page.title: 06Recreation Equestrian Centre
page.content:
They had a lot of horses at the Equestrian Centre.When you come in you ride down a bridle path. There is a field at the bottom of the bridle path.Then you go through a white gate and see the yard.There is a row of seven horse boxes.You learn to ride in an indoor school which is like a huge barn.When you can ride you can go outdoors. It costs four pounds a lesson for an hour.
Before you come in there is a sign saying Equestrian Centre with a picture showing a horse jumping a jump.
The horses at the Equestrian Centre are looked after well.
